author: SAMTIME
description:
Apple has been forced to pull yet another ad from their YouTube channel, and the reason is… cringey.

SOURCES
Apple Pulls Parent Presentation Ad From YouTube: https://www.macrumors.com/2025/06/21/apple-pulls-the-parent-presentation-video/
Apple’s PowerPoint file currently on this page (but it might change): https://www.apple.com/education/college-students/
I can’t share the full Apple video because of copyright and I can’t legally tell you to look on Twitter for it, but I can’t stop you either.

Apple sued over Apple Intelligence ad: https://www.axios.com/2025/03/20/apple-suit-false-advertising-ai-intelligence?

title: Apple Responds to Deleting ANOTHER Ad
